name: Lovely Planet Remix
description:
Choose Your Own First Person Shooter

  • Lovely Planet where each "playlist" offers a new and unique style of first person shooter gameplay!

Switch it up!

  • Classic jump 'n' shoot. Tactical run 'n' gun. Signature Jelly playlist & more!

Leaderboards with Replays

  • Dedicated leaderboards for individual levels and full playlists in Arcade Mode. Watch Replays with a click of a button!
